item.title: Contact page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Send A Message


    Store Location

    Store 1: 25 West 21th Street, Miami FL, US

    Store 2: 76 East Houston Street New York City

    Store 3: 102 West 16th Street, Miami FL, USA

    Contact

    Mobile: +1-541-754-3010

    Hotline: +1-541-651-4228

    Email: kidxtore@elysa.com

    Open Hour

    Monday – Sunday: 8:00 am – 10:00pm

Stylish Fashion
for Little Girls

Sweet and cozy, our collection offers adorable outfits designed for comfort, softness, and style—perfect for your little angel!

Return guarantee

Free shiping

Orders over $99

Little Explorers
Magic in Every Thread

A playful and dreamy collection inspired by childhood imagination. Soft pastels, fun prints, and comfy fabrics make every outfit a little adventure!
